bibl.title: D.M. Bailey and W.V. Davies, British Museum Expedition to Middle Egypt. Ashmunein (1983). (British Museum. Occasional Paper. 53.)
bibl.note: 1. The Excavations. - 2. Cat. of Finds. - 3. Ceramics and Glass. - 4. A Building of the Antonine Per. [the Komasterion (?) known from the pap.]. Discussion of the inscribed 'step' [Dedic. to Good Fortune. Reign of Tiberius] by Lucilla Burn.
